.method public static hidebysig class Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Metadata.Builders.PropertyBuilder ToProperty(class Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Metadata.Builders.PropertyBuilder propertyBuilder, string name) cil managed

Docs.param: The builder for the property being configured.
Docs.summary: Configures the property name that the property is mapped to when targeting Azure Cosmos.
Docs.returns: The same builder instance so that multiple calls can be chained.
Docs.remarks: If an empty string is supplied then the property will not be persisted.
